summary.description: This special issue aims to consolidate the latest research and advancements on the topic of Intelligent DevOps for performance, sustainability, and reliability.
topics_of_interest: Observability and monitoring in DevOps pipelines
Application of AIOps techniques to support quality assurance
Automated anomaly detection and incident prediction
Data-driven feedback loops for continuous improvement
Intelligent test automation and AI-driven defect prediction
Integration of AI and data analytics tools into CI/CD workflows
Infrastructure as code solutions with performance tuning
Methods leveraging AI to enhance software quality
Techniques for improving sustainability in software engineering
Model-based performance analysis and predictive modeling
Leveraging large language models for automation in DevOps
Software architecture modeling informed by operational data
Quality assurance tools and methodologies in microservices
Comparative evaluations and empirical studies of quality assurance tools
